game.name: I Love Gambling
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: I Love Gambling is a arcade style computer simulation in which you play casino minigames to gamble your way out of a billion dollar debt. Use underhanded methods, loan even more money, and have fun gambling your way into financial freedom, or into debt oblivion!
game.shortDescriptionEn: I Love Gambling is a arcade style computer simulation in which you play casino minigames to gamble your way out of a billion dollar debt. Use underhanded methods, loan even more money, and have fun gambling your way into financial freedom, or into debt oblivion!
